title: 大家快来帮帮我！
author: jhjhjhjh
txt_content:
我编写mod时在配置工作环境卡住了，这里老是提示
================ Forge ModLoader Setup Start ===================
MCP Detected already, not downloading
Setting up MCP
Patching commands.py
patching file commands.py
    Commands patch applied successfully
Copying FML conf
Creating Repackaged data
    Creating re-packaged srg
    Creating re-packaged exc
    Creating re-packaged MCP patches
== MCP 8.09 (data: 8.11, client: 1.6.4, server: 1.6.4) ==
"scalac" is not found on the PATH.  Scala files will not be recompiled
WARNING:
The cleanup script will delete all folders created by MCP, including the
src folder which may contain changes you made to the code, along with any
saved worlds from the client or server.
If you really want to clean up, enter "Yes"




怎么办啊？？大家帮帮我

replies.author: GA_空人
replies.txt_content: 你是在第一次配置环境的话直接yes下去就是了= =

replies.author: jhjhjhjh
replies.txt_content:
GA_空人 发表于 2015-5-19 12:25
你是在第一次配置环境的话直接yes下去就是了= =
但我输了Yes然后就报这个：
  
    ================ Forge ModLoader Setup Start ===================
MCP Detected already, not downloading
Setting up MCP
Patching commands.py
patching file commands.py
    Commands patch applied successfully
Copying FML conf
Creating Repackaged data
    Creating re-packaged srg
    Creating re-packaged exc
    Creating re-packaged MCP patches
Backing up client
Backing up server
Gathering assets list from http://resources.download.minecraft.net
Error gathering asset list:
IOError('socket error', error(10060, ''))
Decompile Exception: 1
请按任意键继续. . .

replies.author: jhjhjhjh
replies.txt_content: 话说国外ip对我们中国大陆ip很不友好似的

replies.author: SPE__HaiKuo
replies.txt_content:
jhjhjhjh 发表于 2015-5-19 19:07
话说国外ip对我们中国大陆ip很不友好似的
不，是我们国内对国外不友好，有GFW当着←A←

replies.author: GA_空人
replies.txt_content:
无法连接的话可以尝试用个VPN
或者用个代理
还有你现在是卡在了下载assets的地方，可以直接把你自己mc的assets直接拿过来用，就不用再去下载了
具体的可以在论坛上找找配置开发环境的教程啥的 
不过还是建议最好赶紧将开发环境换成1.7啊。。。1.6已经过去太久了。。。
论坛上好像也有配置好发上来的forge开发环境，可以试着去找一找

replies.author: jhjhjhjh
replies.txt_content:
GA_空人 发表于 2015-5-19 20:45
无法连接的话可以尝试用个VPN
或者用个代理
还有你现在是卡在了下载assets的地方，可以直接把你自己mc的ass ...









































我是用java7+jdk7版本都是1.6.4的，mcp是8.11Forge也装好了
